#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

JOB_DIR="$HOME/.background-jobs"
mkdir -p "$JOB_DIR"

start_job() {
    local name="$1"
    local command="$2"
    local logfile="$JOB_DIR/$name.log"
    local pidfile="$JOB_DIR/$name.pid"
    
    if [ -f "$pidfile" ] && kill -0 $(cat "$pidfile") 2>/dev/null; then
        echo "Job '$name' already running (PID: $(cat "$pidfile"))"
        return 1
    fi
    
    echo "Starting job '$name'..."
    nohup bash -c "$command" > "$logfile" 2>&1 &
    echo $! > "$pidfile"
    echo "Job started (PID: $!, log: $logfile)"
}

stop_job() {
    local name="$1"
    local pidfile="$JOB_DIR/$name.pid"
    
    if [ ! -f "$pidfile" ]; then
        echo "Job '$name' not found"
        return 1
    fi
    
    local pid=$(cat "$pidfile")
    if kill "$pid" 2>/dev/null; then
        echo "Job '$name' stopped (PID: $pid)"
        rm "$pidfile"
    else
        echo "Job '$name' not running (cleaning up)"
        rm "$pidfile"
    fi
}

status_job() {
    local name="$1"
    local pidfile="$JOB_DIR/$name.pid"
    
    if [ ! -f "$pidfile" ]; then
        echo "Job '$name': Not running"
        return 1
    fi
    
    local pid=$(cat "$pidfile")
    if kill -0 "$pid" 2>/dev/null; then
        echo "Job '$name': Running (PID: $pid)"
        ps -p "$pid" -o pid,ppid,%cpu,%mem,etime,cmd
    else
        echo "Job '$name': Dead (cleaning up)"
        rm "$pidfile"
    fi
}

list_jobs() {
    echo "=== Background Jobs ==="
    for pidfile in "$JOB_DIR"/*.pid; do
        [ -f "$pidfile" ] || continue
        local name=$(basename "$pidfile" .pid)
        status_job "$name"
    done
}

show_log() {
    local name="$1"
    local lines="${2:-50}"
    local logfile="$JOB_DIR/$name.log"
    
    if [ ! -f "$logfile" ]; then
        echo "No log file for job '$name'"
        return 1
    fi
    
    tail -n "$lines" "$logfile"
}

case "${1:-}" in
    start)
        [ -z "${2:-}" ] && echo "Usage: $0 start <name> <command>" && exit 1
        [ -z "${3:-}" ] && echo "Usage: $0 start <name> <command>" && exit 1
        start_job "$2" "$3"
        ;;
    stop)
        [ -z "${2:-}" ] && echo "Usage: $0 stop <name>" && exit 1
        stop_job "$2"
        ;;
    status)
        [ -z "${2:-}" ] && echo "Usage: $0 status <name>" && exit 1
        status_job "$2"
        ;;
    list)
        list_jobs
        ;;
    log)
        [ -z "${2:-}" ] && echo "Usage: $0 log <name> [lines]" && exit 1
        show_log "$2" "${3:-50}"
        ;;
    *)
        echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop|status|list|log} [args]"
        echo ""
        echo "Examples:"
        echo "  $0 start backup './backup.sh'"
        echo "  $0 status backup"
        echo "  $0 log backup 100"
        echo "  $0 list"
        echo "  $0 stop backup"
        exit 1
        ;;
esac
EOF
